title.narrative: Modelo económico, endógeno, solidario y sostenible para el buen vivir rural, en el corredor Volcán Imbabura.

description.narrative: El OE: Impulsar el diseo e implementación de un modelo económico, endógeno, solidario y sostenible para el buen vivir rural, en el corredor Volcán Imbabura.R1. Los GAD rurales consolidan un modelo de gestión eficiente/eficaz de gobernanza para el desarrollo sustentable y equitativo del territorio. R2. Construido una red de iniciativas de turismo rural asociativo con productos y servicios de calidad. R3. establecen sistemas ecológicamente eficientes y sustentables de producción agropecuaria.

description.narrative: Ecuador, Sierra Norte, provincia de Imbabura, cantones: Otavalo, Ibarra, Antonio Ante. Parroquias: Miguel Egas, San Roque, Andrade Marn, Natabuela, Chaltura, San Antonio, Imbaya, La Esperanza, Angochagua, Iluman y San Pablo

description.narrative: Reported results indicators by the European Commission ¿ International Cooperation and Development (DEVCO) may not represent the complete set of indicators monitored for the project. The results are reported using a contribution approach. This means that where a project has been financed by the EU jointly with other funders ¿ such as partner country governments or other donors ¿ the overall outputs of the collective effort are reported rather than outputs attributed to the share of funding provided by the EU. For higher levels of results, such as outcomes and impacts, the project will only have contributed to the overall effort.
